QR-Make-Desc: Enter content to instantly generate a QR code
riskWarning-1: Any user can use this platform's service to instantly generate QR codes for various content.
riskWarning-2: Please evaluate security risks and information safety before scanning.
riskWarning-3: The platform is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses caused by using its service.
QR-Load-Desc: Analyze QR code from an image file
askUploadImage: Click or drag an image here to upload for analysis
errorNotImage: Only image files can be uploaded (jpg, png, gif ...)
QR-Scan-Desc: Use camera to scan a physical QR code
QR-Scan-Fail: Unable to scan physical QR code!
